JobFullDesc:
The Manager/Senior Manager, Strategy & Business Planning, is an exciting role within the international GCS credit risk management team based in London. This individual will report directly to the VP – CCO, GCS Risk International and work in close partnership with business partners, all international risk teams, and global CFR functional teams to ensure the alignment of risk strategies against business objectives. They will also manage the day to day logistics of the team, leading colleague engagement and development across the organisation.
 
Responsibilities:

Produce material targeting a wide range of senior level stakeholders for results and performance sharing as well as functional updates
Strategize and organize required forums for the greater commercial risk team across international
Use international portfolio analytics to deliver meaningful insights internally and with partners
Track and report on strategically significant projects where cross-functional and cross-market collaboration is complex
Direct project management of select priority initiatives
Manage organizational strategy of the EMEA-based international credit risk organization
Serve as a point of contact for partners and stakeholders on all matters regarding international GCS credit risk
Support on all colleague engagement initiatives
Focus on team culture
Manage day to day logistics of the team including award nominations, preparation for BURs, hosting of team meetings, amongst other activities

This role may be subject to additional background verification checks.

Project management skills
Excellent communication, negotiation and influence management skills
Passionate about colleague engagement and development
Strong collaborative skills to partner across geographies and time zones
Experience producing senior-level presentations on results & performance 
Strong analytical skills
Knowledge of risk systems and capabilities preferred
